document_data.name: ''Rakshasa Hide''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rakshasa hide''''' was a kind of [[hide armor]] found in [[Eberron]].{{DDO-time}}
document_data.Description: The armor closely resembled a [[tiger]]skin outfit, being made from the tanned [[hide (leather)|hide]] of a [[rakshasa]].
document_data.Powers: The hide gave the bearer many of the same innate abilities that rakshasas had. It improved their awareness, aim, and reaction speed, and produced a roar that frightened attackers.
document_data.History: A suit of ''rakshasa armor'' was taken from (or made from) the rakshasa [[Tahmael]], who was at the [[Lords of Dust]] [[Cult safehouse|safehouse]] in [[Stormreach]] when the [[Church of the Silver Flame]] attacked, during a plot to release the Overlord [[Spinner of Shadows]].
